chat.title: Login initialization
chat.content: Initialize and display the chat widget only when the user is logged in.

chat.title: Dashboard display
chat.content: Display the dashboard instead of the chat area on initialization.

chat.title: Disable dashboard
chat.content: Disable the dashboard, and allow only one conversation per user.

chat.title: Allow only one conversation
chat.content: Allow only one conversation per user.

chat.title: Hide chat outside of office hours
chat.content: Disable and hide the chat widget outside of scheduled office hours.

chat.title: Hide chat if no agents online
chat.content: Disable and hide the chat widget if all agents are offline.

chat.title: Translate automatically
chat.content: Translate the chat widget's text elements automatically to match the user's browser language.

chat.title: Open automatically
chat.content: Open the chat window automatically when a new message is received.

chat.title: Disable uploads
chat.content: Disable file uploading capabilities within the chat.

chat.title: Articles
chat.content: Display the articles section in the dashboard area.

chat.title: Articles title
chat.content: Rename the Articles archive panel title. Default is 'Help Center'.

chat.title: Manual initialization
chat.content: Disable auto-initialization of the chat widget. When this setting is active you must initialize the chat widget via Javascript API.

messages.title: Offline message
messages.content: Send a message to the user when their first message is sent outside of scheduled office hours or all agents are offline. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.

messages.title: Privacy message
messages.content: Display a privacy message with Accept or Decline buttons. The user must click Accept to start using the chat. This is useful for enforcing a privacy policy and GDPR compliance.

messages.title: Popup message
messages.content: Display an automatic popup message to new users.

messages.title: Welcome message
messages.content: Send a message to new users when they visit the website for the first time. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.

messages.title: Follow up message
messages.content: Send a message requesting the user's email if no agents reply within 15 seconds or all agents are offline. These settings will be used by all email forms. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.

messages.title: Close message
messages.content: Send a message to the user when the agent archive the conversation.

messages.title: Subscribe message
messages.content: Send a message requesting the user's email and send a confirmation email to the user. The message is sent only to users without email. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.

messages.title: Subscribe message - Email
messages.content: Subscribe message email template sent to the user when the user communicate the email via the subscribe message form. You can use text, HTML, and the following merge fields: {user_name}, {user_email}.

admin.title: Admin title
admin.content: Set the title of the administration area.

admin.title: Admin login logo
admin.content: Replace the Support Board logo on the admin login page.

admin.title: Admin login message
admin.content: Replace the Support Board message on the admin login page.

admin.title: Collapse panels
admin.content: Automatically collapse the profile details panel, and other panels, of the admin area.

admin.title: Automatically translate admin area
admin.content: Translate the admin area automatically to match the browser language.

admin.title: Automatically archive conversations
admin.content: Archive automatically the conversations marked as read every 24h.

admin.title: Enable users area for agents
admin.content: Enable the users area for agents.

admin.title: RTL
admin.content: Activate the Right-To-Left (RTL) reading layout for the admin area.

admin.title: Transcript type
admin.content: Set the default transcript file type.

admin.title: Custom JS
admin.content: Enter the URL of a .js file, to load it automatically in the admin area.

admin.title: Custom CSS
admin.content: Enter the URL of a .css file, to load it automatically in the admin area.

notifications.title: Sounds
notifications.content: Play a sound when a user receives an incoming message or sends an outgoing message.

notifications.title: Sounds for admin
notifications.content: Play a sound when a agent receives an incoming message or sends an outgoing message.

notifications.title: Agent email notifications
notifications.content: Send an email to an agent when a user replies and the agent is offline. An email is automatically sent to all agents for new conversations.

notifications.title: User email notifications
notifications.content: Send an email to the user when an agent replies and the user is offline.

notifications.title: Desktop notifications
notifications.content: Show a desktop notification when a new message is received.

notifications.title: Flash notifications
notifications.content: Show a browser tab notification when a new message is received.

notifications.title: User notification email
notifications.content: Email template for the notification email that is sent to a user when an agent replies. You can use text, HTML, and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.

notifications.title: Agent notification email
notifications.content: Email template for the notification email that is sent to an agent when a user sends a new message. You can use text, HTML, and the following merge fields: {conversation_link}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.

notifications.title: Push notifications
notifications.content: Push notifications settings. Enter the Pusher Beams details.

notifications.title: Text message notifications
notifications.content: Enter your Twilio account details. You can use text and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {message}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {recipient_email}, {sender_email}.

notifications.title: Email piping
notifications.content: Email piping server information and more settings.

notifications.title: Email signature
notifications.content: Set the default email signature that will be appended to automated emails and direct emails.

notifications.title: Email header
notifications.content: Set the default email header that will be prepended to automated emails and direct emails.

notifications.title: Notifications icon
notifications.content: Set the default notifications icon. The icon will be used as a profile image if the user doesn't have one.

notifications.title: Test user email
notifications.content: Send a test user notification email to verify email settings.

notifications.title: Test agent email
notifications.content: Send a test agent notification email to verify email settings.

users.title: Register all visitors
users.content: Register all visitors automatically. When this option is not active, only the visitors that start a chat will be registered.

users.title: Require registration
users.content: Require the user registration or login before start a chat. To enable the login area the password field must be included.

users.title: Disable registration during office hours
users.content: Enable the registration outside of scheduled office hours only.

users.title: Disable registration if agents online
users.content: Enable the registration only if all agents are offline.

users.title: Registration link
users.content: Redirect the user to the registration link instead of showing the registration form.

users.title: Registration form
users.content: User registration form information.

users.title: Login form
users.content: User login form information.

users.title: Profile image
users.content: Include a profile image field in the registration form to allow a user to upload a profile image.

users.title: Last name
users.content: Include the last name field in the registration form.

users.title: Password
users.content: Include the password field in the registration form.

users.title: Disable email
users.content: Remove the email field from the registration form.

users.title: Optional registration fields
users.content: Choose which optional fields to include in the registration form. Name, email, and password fields are all included by default.

users.title: Require phone
users.content: Make the registration phone field mandatory.

users.title: User details in success message
users.content: Append the registration user details to the success message.

users.title: Custom fields
users.content: Add custom fields to the user profile details.

users.title: Include custom fields
users.content: Include custom fields in the registration form.

users.title: Visitor name prefix
users.content: Rename the visitor name prefix. Default is 'User'.

users.title: Visitor default name
users.content: Set the default username to use in bot messages and emails when the user doesn't have a name.

users.title: Full visitor details
users.content: Save useful information like user country and language also for visitors.

users.title: Allow duplicate emails
users.content: Allow registration with an email already used by creating a new user without email.

users.title: Bot name
users.content: Rename the chat bot. Default is 'Bot'.

users.title: Bot profile image
users.content: Set a profile image for the chat bot.

users.title: Delete leads
users.content: Delete all leads and all messages and conversations linked to them.

design.title: Primary color
design.content: Set the primary color of the chat widget.

design.title: Secondary color
design.content: Set the secondary color of the chat widget.

design.title: Tertiary color
design.content: Set the tertiary color of the chat widget.

design.title: Chat position
design.content: Set the position of the chat widget.

design.title: Display user's profile image
design.content: Display the user's profile image within the chat.

design.title: Hide agent's profile image
design.content: Hide the agent's profile image within the chat.

design.title: Header title
design.content: Change the title text in the header area of the chat widget. This text will be replaced by the agent's name once the first reply is sent. Default is 'Support Board Chat'.

design.title: Header message
design.content: Change the message text in the header area of the chat widget. This text will be replaced by the agent headline once the first reply is sent.

design.title: Display user name in header
design.content: Replace the header title with the user's first name and last name when available.

design.title: Header brand image
design.content: Display a brand image in the header area. This only applies for the 'brand' header type.

design.title: Header background image
design.content: Apply a custom background image for the header area.

design.title: Chat button icon
design.content: Change the chat button image with a custom one.

design.title: Built-in chat button icons
design.content: Change the chat button image with a custom one.

design.title: Chat background
design.content: Choose a background texture for the chat header and conversation area.

design.title: Chat button offset
design.content: Adjust the chat button position. Values are in px.

miscellaneous.title: Envato Purchase Code
miscellaneous.content: Enter your Envato Purchase Code to activate automatic updates and unlock all the features.

miscellaneous.title: Automatic updates
miscellaneous.content: Automatically check and install new updates. A valid Envato Purchase Code and valid apps's license keys are required.

miscellaneous.title: Webhooks
miscellaneous.content: Webhooks are automated messages sent from Support Board when something happens. They have a message and are sent to a unique URL defined by you. See the API docs for more details.

miscellaneous.title: Pusher
miscellaneous.content: Improve chat performance with Pusher and WebSockets. This setting stops all AJAX/HTTP real-time requests that slow down your server and use instead the WebSockets.

miscellaneous.title: Newsletter
miscellaneous.content: Subscribe users to your preferred newsletter service when they provide an email.

miscellaneous.title: Scheduled office hours
miscellaneous.content: Set the default office hours for when agents are shown as available. These settings are also used for all other settings that rely on office hours.

miscellaneous.title: UTC Offset
miscellaneous.content: Set the UTC offset of the office hours timetable. The correct value can be negative, and it's generated automatically once you click this input field, if it's empty.

miscellaneous.title: Departments
miscellaneous.content: Add and manage additional support departments.

miscellaneous.title: Departments settings
miscellaneous.content: Manage here the departments settings.

miscellaneous.title: Queue
miscellaneous.content: Distribute conversations proportionately between agents and notify visitors of their position within the queue. Response time is in minutes. You can use the following merge fields in the message: {position}, {minutes}. They will be replaced by the real values in real-time.

miscellaneous.title: Routing
miscellaneous.content: Distribute conversations proportionately between agents, and block an agent from viewing the conversations of the other agents.

miscellaneous.title: Hide conversations of other agents
miscellaneous.content: Prevent agents from viewing conversations assigned to other agents. This setting is automatically enabled if routing or queue is active.

miscellaneous.title: Saved replies
miscellaneous.content: Add and manage saved replies that can be used by agents in the chat editor. Saved replies can be printed by typing # followed by the reply name plus space.

miscellaneous.title: Rich messages
miscellaneous.content: Rich messages are code snippets that can be utilized within a chat message. They can contain HTML code and are automatically rendered in the chat. Rich messages can be used with the following syntax: [rich-message-name]. There are a tonne of built-in rich messages to choose from.

miscellaneous.title: Cookie domain
miscellaneous.content: Sets the main domain where chat is used to enable login and conversations sharing between the main domain and sub domains.

miscellaneous.title: Performance optimization
miscellaneous.content: Disable features you don't use and improve the chat performance.

miscellaneous.title: System requirements
miscellaneous.content: Check the server configurations and make sure it has all the requirements.

miscellaneous.title: Support Board Path
miscellaneous.content: Return the Support Board path of your server.

miscellaneous.title: Export settings
miscellaneous.content: Export Support Board settings.

miscellaneous.title: Import settings
miscellaneous.content: Import settings into Support Board.
